channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Failed Job Deactivator Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Failed Job Deactivator Plugin

item.title: CVE-2022-34817|2024-08-03T09:22:10.203Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20failed%20job%20deactivator%20plugin
item.description: A cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Jenkins Failed Job Deactivator Plugin 1.2.1 and earlier allows attackers to disable jobs.

item.title: CVE-2022-34818|2024-08-03T09:22:09.889Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20failed%20job%20deactivator%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Failed Job Deactivator Plugin 1.2.1 and earlier does not perform permission checks in several views and HTTP endpoints, allowing attackers with Overall/Read permission to disable jobs.
